name: Slow Cooker Squash Indian Dhal
description: Make a delicious Indian dhal without having to cook at all. That’s right—let your slow cooker slowly meld together flavours of curry with wholesome, real ingredients. Assemble, slow cook, and enjoy.
preparation: Combine all ingredients in a slow cooker and stir gently.
Cover and cook for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low setting.
Place a large freezable bag standing open in a bowl; this will keep it in place when adding ingredients.
Place all ingredients except broth in the bag, seal, and lay flat in the freezer.
When ready to eat, remove from freezer at least 1 hour before cooking.
Place contents in the slow cooker, add broth, cover, and cook for 4 hours on high or 8 hours on low setting.
tips: Once cooked, use a hand blender to liquefy the soup.
Make it authentic: top with fresh cilantro, lime juice, and 1 tbsp Greek yogurt.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve on 1 cup cooked basmati rice. Top with 2 cups baby spinach or kale.

products.name: Madras Curry Powder
summary: For those who like their curry on the spicy side, we’ve got you! Easily make a Better Than Takeout curry at home that’s sodium free and packed with amazing flavour.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavor as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
